content.rendered:
Barcodes are images that are created such that the UPC or EAN of your product can be scanned.  They are generated directly from your UPC or EAN numbers.  With every order from UPCs.com, you receive Barcode images (in PNG, TIFF, JPG, and other formats) as well as a spreadsheet of all your codes instantly at checkout!

Why Buy Barcodes from Us?

  • All of your barcode numbers – You will be able to download them instantly after checking out!
  • International compatible barcodes, all for the same price.
  • All barcode formats available – Want a different format?  Generate barcodes in JPEG, PNG, PDF, SVG, and EPS formats of varying sizes in seconds at our Free Barcode Generator.
  • Need a QR Code Generator?
  • No hidden charges or fees. Once you buy your barcodes that’s it! There are no renewal fees, no membership fees, and your barcodes will never expire.
  • We offer the lowest prices on the Internet. Our 110% price match guarantee is unmatched!
  • Over 100,000 satisfied customers to date, and growing!

If you’re using Amazon, Amazon will provide barcodes to you after create the listing using the UPCs you purchase from us, all you need to do is supply the UPC during listing creation and then print item labels from the Manager Inventory menu.  On Amazon you can either use your own barcode you bought from us, or you can print the Item Label that Amazon provides and use that (or place it over an existing barcode).

Want us to print the barcodes or Amazon FNSKU labels for you and ship them? See our Barcode Labels page here:

➡️ Buy Printed Barcode Labels

You can purchase your Barcodes codes from us using the “Buy Now” button below, and will delivery within minutes to your inbox:

All of our barcodes can be used for Amazon, eBay, iTunes, and more. They are GS1-Verified, and we offer money back guarantee within 30 days. You can see our bulk pricing for barcodes below.

2022 UPCs.com Barcode Pricing

5000 Barcodes $550 ($0.11 Each) Buy Now
8000 Barcodes $800 ($0.10 Each) Buy Now
8000+ Barcodes Contact Us Contact Us

If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask us.

You can also buy barcodes from our partners at Legal Barcode here.
